item.title: What I'm up to this summer
item.description: Work I’m doing Collaborating with Sandia National Labs on Bayesian model calibration and uncertainty quantification Original post-selection inference, for application to sparse normal means problem and spatial hotspot detection Conferences I am attending May 21 - 23, Atlantic Causal Inference Conference, Carnegie Melon University, Pittsburgh, PA June 24 - 29, ISBA World Meeting 2018, University of Edinburgh
